analytics_cookie_details.name: _ga
analytics_cookie_details.purpose: Google Analytics. Tells us how you use our websites. Used to ensure the website operates sufficiently for users.

analytics_cookie_details.name: _gat
analytics_cookie_details.purpose: Google Analytics. Helps stop Google Analytics web servers crashing when collecting information on how you use our websites. Used to ensure the website operates sufficiently for users.

analytics_cookie_details.name: _gid
analytics_cookie_details.purpose: Google Analytics. Sets a unique (anonymous) ID for your session to help tell us how you use our websites. Used to ensure the website operates sufficiently for users.

analytics_cookie_details.name: _gali
analytics_cookie_details.purpose: Used by Google Analytics to determine which links on a page are being clicked.

analytics_cookie_details.name: ___utmvc
analytics_cookie_details.purpose: This cookie enables the function of Google Analytics.

cookie_banner_title: We use cookies on this website
cookie_banner_text: By using this site, you agree that we may store and access cookies on your device.

necessary_cookie_details.name: ApplicationGatewayAffinity
necessary_cookie_details.purpose: This cookie is used by Azure Apps to keep a user session on the same server.

necessary_cookie_details.name: ApplicationGatewayAffinityCORS
necessary_cookie_details.purpose: This cookie is used by Azure Apps to keep a user session on the same server.

necessary_cookie_details.name: cookiesAccept
necessary_cookie_details.purpose: Cookie that remembers users' privacy choices.

necessary_cookie_details.name: cookieAnalytics
necessary_cookie_details.purpose: Cookie that remembers users' privacy choices.
